problem_names:
lemma deriv_boundI [intro?]:
  "(\<And>b m. n < m \<Longrightarrow> (a, b) \<in> r ^^ m \<Longrightarrow> False) \<Longrightarrow> deriv_bound r a n"

lemma deriv_boundE:
  assumes "deriv_bound r a n"
    and "(\<And>b m. n < m \<Longrightarrow> (a, b) \<in> r ^^ m \<Longrightarrow> False) \<Longrightarrow> P"
  shows "P"

lemma deriv_bound_iff:
  "deriv_bound r a n \<longleftrightarrow> (\<forall>b m. n < m \<longrightarrow> (a, b) \<notin> r ^^ m)"

lemma deriv_bound_mono:
  assumes "m \<le> n" and "deriv_bound r a m"
  shows "deriv_bound r a n"

lemma deriv_bound_image: 
  assumes b: "deriv_bound r' (f a) n"
    and step: "\<And> a b. (a, b) \<in> r \<Longrightarrow> (f a, f b) \<in> r'\<^sup>+"
  shows "deriv_bound r a n"

lemma deriv_bound_subset:
  assumes "r \<subseteq> r'\<^sup>+"
    and b: "deriv_bound r' a n"
  shows "deriv_bound r a n"

lemma deriv_bound_SN_on:
  assumes "deriv_bound r a n"
  shows "SN_on r {a}"

lemma deriv_bound_steps:
  assumes "(a, b) \<in> r ^^ n"
    and "deriv_bound r a m"
  shows "n \<le> m"
translations:
lemma deriv_boundI [intro?]:
  "(\<And>b m. n < m \<Longrightarrow> (a, b) \<in> r ^^ m \<Longrightarrow> False) \<Longrightarrow> deriv_bound r a n"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>b m.
        \<lbrakk>n < m; (a, b) \<in> r ^^ m\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> False) \<Longrightarrow>
    deriv_bound r a n
by (auto simp: deriv_bound_def) (metis lessI relpow_Suc_I)

lemma deriv_boundE:
  assumes "deriv_bound r a n"
    and "(\<And>b m. n < m \<Longrightarrow> (a, b) \<in> r ^^ m \<Longrightarrow> False) \<Longrightarrow> P"
  shows "P"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P
using assms(1)

proof (prove)
using this:
  deriv_bound r a n

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P

by (intro assms)
     (auto simp: deriv_bound_def relpow_add relcomp.simps dest!: less_imp_Suc_add, metis relpow_E2)

lemma deriv_bound_iff:
  "deriv_bound r a n \<longleftrightarrow> (\<forall>b m. n < m \<longrightarrow> (a, b) \<notin> r ^^ m)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. deriv_bound r a n =
    (\<forall>b m. n < m \<longrightarrow> (a, b) \<notin> r ^^ m)
by (auto elim: deriv_boundE intro: deriv_boundI)

lemma deriv_bound_empty [simp]:
  "deriv_bound {} a n"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. deriv_bound {} a n
by (simp add: deriv_bound_def)

lemma deriv_bound_mono:
  assumes "m \<le> n" and "deriv_bound r a m"
  shows "deriv_bound r a n"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. deriv_bound r a n
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  m \<le> n
  deriv_bound r a m

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. deriv_bound r a n
by (auto simp: deriv_bound_iff)

lemma deriv_bound_image: 
  assumes b: "deriv_bound r' (f a) n"
    and step: "\<And> a b. (a, b) \<in> r \<Longrightarrow> (f a, f b) \<in> r'\<^sup>+"
  shows "deriv_bound r a n"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. deriv_bound r a n
proof

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>b m.
       \<lbrakk>n < m; (a, b) \<in> r ^^ m\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> False
fix b m

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>b m.
       \<lbrakk>n < m; (a, b) \<in> r ^^ m\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> False
assume "(a, b) \<in> r ^^ m"

proof (state)
this:
  (a, b) \<in> r ^^ m

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>b m.
       \<lbrakk>n < m; (a, b) \<in> r ^^ m\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> False
from relpow_image [OF step this]

proof (chain)
picking this:
  (\<And>s t.
      (s, t) \<in> r \<Longrightarrow>
      (?b3 s, ?b3 t) \<in> r) \<Longrightarrow>
  (f (?b3 a), f (?b3 b)) \<in> r'\<^sup>+ ^^ m
have "(f a, f b) \<in> r'\<^sup>+ ^^ m"

proof (prove)
using this:
  (\<And>s t.
      (s, t) \<in> r \<Longrightarrow>
      (?b3 s, ?b3 t) \<in> r) \<Longrightarrow>
  (f (?b3 a), f (?b3 b)) \<in> r'\<^sup>+ ^^ m

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (f a, f b) \<in> r'\<^sup>+ ^^ m

proof (state)
this:
  (f a, f b) \<in> r'\<^sup>+ ^^ m

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>b m.
       \<lbrakk>n < m; (a, b) \<in> r ^^ m\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> False
from trancl_steps_relpow [OF subset_refl this]

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<exists>ma\<ge>m. (f a, f b) \<in> r' ^^ ma
obtain k where "k \<ge> m" and "(f a, f b) \<in> r' ^^ k"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<exists>ma\<ge>m. (f a, f b) \<in> r' ^^ ma

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>k.
        \<lbrakk>m \<le> k; (f a, f b) \<in> r' ^^ k\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  m \<le> k
  (f a, f b) \<in> r' ^^ k

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>b m.
       \<lbrakk>n < m; (a, b) \<in> r ^^ m\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> False
moreover

proof (state)
this:
  m \<le> k
  (f a, f b) \<in> r' ^^ k

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>b m.
       \<lbrakk>n < m; (a, b) \<in> r ^^ m\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> False
assume "n < m"

proof (state)
this:
  n < m

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>b m.
       \<lbrakk>n < m; (a, b) \<in> r ^^ m\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> False
moreover

proof (state)
this:
  n < m

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>b m.
       \<lbrakk>n < m; (a, b) \<in> r ^^ m\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> False
with deriv_bound_mono [OF _ b, of "m - 1"]

proof (chain)
picking this:
  n \<le> m - 1 \<Longrightarrow> deriv_bound r' (f a) (m - 1)
  n < m
have "deriv_bound r' (f a) (m - 1)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  n \<le> m - 1 \<Longrightarrow> deriv_bound r' (f a) (m - 1)
  n < m

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. deriv_bound r' (f a) (m - 1)
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  deriv_bound r' (f a) (m - 1)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>b m.
       \<lbrakk>n < m; (a, b) \<in> r ^^ m\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> False
ultimately

proof (chain)
picking this:
  m \<le> k
  (f a, f b) \<in> r' ^^ k
  n < m
  deriv_bound r' (f a) (m - 1)
show False

proof (prove)
using this:
  m \<le> k
  (f a, f b) \<in> r' ^^ k
  n < m
  deriv_bound r' (f a) (m - 1)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. False
using b

proof (prove)
using this:
  m \<le> k
  (f a, f b) \<in> r' ^^ k
  n < m
  deriv_bound r' (f a) (m - 1)
  deriv_bound r' (f a) n

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. False
by (simp add: deriv_bound_iff)

proof (state)
this:
  False

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma deriv_bound_subset:
  assumes "r \<subseteq> r'\<^sup>+"
    and b: "deriv_bound r' a n"
  shows "deriv_bound r a n"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. deriv_bound r a n
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  r \<subseteq> r'\<^sup>+
  deriv_bound r' a n

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. deriv_bound r a n
by (intro deriv_bound_image [of _ "\<lambda>x. x", OF b]) auto

lemma deriv_bound_SN_on:
  assumes "deriv_bound r a n"
  shows "SN_on r {a}"
proof

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>f.
       \<lbrakk>f 0 \<in> {a}; \<forall>i. (f i, f (Suc i)) \<in> r\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> False
fix f

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>f.
       \<lbrakk>f 0 \<in> {a}; \<forall>i. (f i, f (Suc i)) \<in> r\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> False
assume steps: "\<forall> i. (f i, f (Suc i)) \<in> r" and "f 0 \<in> {a}"

proof (state)
this:
  \<forall>i. (f i, f (Suc i)) \<in> r
  f 0 \<in> {a}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>f.
       \<lbrakk>f 0 \<in> {a}; \<forall>i. (f i, f (Suc i)) \<in> r\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> False
with assms

proof (chain)
picking this:
  deriv_bound r a n
  \<forall>i. (f i, f (Suc i)) \<in> r
  f 0 \<in> {a}
have "(f 0, f (Suc n)) \<notin> r ^^ Suc n"

proof (prove)
using this:
  deriv_bound r a n
  \<forall>i. (f i, f (Suc i)) \<in> r
  f 0 \<in> {a}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (f 0, f (Suc n)) \<notin> r ^^ Suc n
by (blast elim: deriv_boundE)

proof (state)
this:
  (f 0, f (Suc n)) \<notin> r ^^ Suc n

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>f.
       \<lbrakk>f 0 \<in> {a}; \<forall>i. (f i, f (Suc i)) \<in> r\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> False
moreover

proof (state)
this:
  (f 0, f (Suc n)) \<notin> r ^^ Suc n

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>f.
       \<lbrakk>f 0 \<in> {a}; \<forall>i. (f i, f (Suc i)) \<in> r\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> False
have "(f 0, f (Suc n)) \<in> r ^^ Suc n"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (f 0, f (Suc n)) \<in> r ^^ Suc n
using steps

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>i. (f i, f (Suc i)) \<in> r

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (f 0, f (Suc n)) \<in> r ^^ Suc n
unfolding relpow_fun_conv

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>i. (f i, f (Suc i)) \<in> r

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>fa.
       fa 0 = f 0 \<and>
       fa (Suc n) = f (Suc n) \<and>
       (\<forall>i<Suc n. (fa i, fa (Suc i)) \<in> r)
by (intro exI [of _ f]) auto

proof (state)
this:
  (f 0, f (Suc n)) \<in> r ^^ Suc n

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>f.
       \<lbrakk>f 0 \<in> {a}; \<forall>i. (f i, f (Suc i)) \<in> r\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> False
ultimately

proof (chain)
picking this:
  (f 0, f (Suc n)) \<notin> r ^^ Suc n
  (f 0, f (Suc n)) \<in> r ^^ Suc n
show False

proof (prove)
using this:
  (f 0, f (Suc n)) \<notin> r ^^ Suc n
  (f 0, f (Suc n)) \<in> r ^^ Suc n

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. False

proof (state)
this:
  False

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma deriv_bound_steps:
  assumes "(a, b) \<in> r ^^ n"
    and "deriv_bound r a m"
  shows "n \<le> m"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. n \<le> m
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  (a, b) \<in> r ^^ n
  deriv_bound r a m

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. n \<le> m
by (auto iff: not_less deriv_bound_iff)
end
